abstract: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for the most interesting items on the Web. Today’s selection includes items on Facebook bans in the workplaces and how to use emoticons.
snippet: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for the most interesting items on the Web. Today’s selection includes items on Facebook bans in the workplaces and how to use emoticons.
lead_paragraph: Here’s what the tech reporters and editors of The New York Times found on the Web.

headline.main: Today’s Scuttlebot: Facebook Bans at Work and Emoticons
